mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Boreman, A. J. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Boreman, A. J.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] 186. By Telegraph from Parkersburg 8 186. Are we to have no aid the enemy in force at Cairo yesterday & burnt railroad bridge Is Genl Roberts doing nothing there is great wrong somewhere AJ Boreman 28W122&122coll
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Boreman, A. J.
Parkersburg, (West) Virginia
not given
Pierpont, Francis H.
